_meta.description: Master reference of all values found across all JSON files

all_tags: Can be equipped in mainHand OR offHand
Chaotic damage, random type each hit
Cloth armor - lowest defense, magic bonuses
Frontline fighter class - high HP, melee damage
Heal percentage of damage dealt (alias for lifesteal)
Heavy armor - high defense, low mobility
Hits all targets in frontal cone
Hits all targets in straight line
Jack of all trades class - balanced versatility
Light armor - low defense, high mobility
Loot hunter class - luck, rare drops, gathering
Magical researcher class - mana, alchemy, arcane
Master crafter class - crafting speed and quality
Mobile gatherer class - speed, ranged, nature
Physical impact damage, bonus vs armor
Physical piercing damage, ignores some armor
Return damage to attacker (alias for reflect)

allComplete: You are now a true warrior. Continue your training!
You've learned all I can teach. Go forth and explore!
Your aid has been invaluable, friend.
default: Greetings! I've traveled far and wide seeking rare materials.
Ho there, warrior! Ready to test your mettle?
Welcome, traveler! I sense great potential within you.
description: A single attack of unimaginable power that ignores defenses and deals catastrophic damage.
Attack all enemies in a wide radius around you.
Attack much faster for a short burst of time.
Aura that drains life from all nearby enemies
Balanced generalists who dabble in everything. Adventurers have flexibility and choice.
Blade that projects waves of flame
Blast of freezing wind in a cone that slows and freezes enemies
Brace yourself against incoming attacks, reducing damage taken significantly.
Call down a meteor that devastates an area and ignites all enemies
Channel raw strength into your pickaxe, doubling mining damage for a sustained period.
Combat flows through you like water. Blade and mind move as one.
Continuously regenerate massive health and repair equipment durability.
Create a point of intense gravity that pulls and crushes all nearby foes
Cursed blade that feeds on lifeblood
Dramatically boost crafted item quality and gain massive rarity upgrade chance.
Dramatically increase attack damage and speed simultaneously.
Dramatically increase the chance of finding rare materials while gathering.
Dramatically increases wood gathering speed for a short duration
Extend engineering puzzle time and improve device quality significantly.
Extend your smithing mini-game timer, giving more time for perfect strikes.
Fall into a steady rhythm, chopping wood much faster than normal.
Fire-veined ores call to you. The heat of the deep welcomes your touch.
First blood has been drawn. You've tasted battle and survived.
Fortune herself smiles upon you. Or perhaps you've rigged the dice.
Gain extra time for your alchemy mini-game and increase potion quality.
Gain increased chance for perfect enchantment patterns and rarity upgrades.
Gain massive bonus materials from every gather for an extended period.
Gather Oak Logs
Gather extra materials from each resource node you harvest.
Gather from multiple resource nodes in a small area simultaneously.
Hammer that freezes and repels nearby foes
Improve your refining mini-game time and material quality output.
Impurities flee before your knowledge. Material transformation is your domain.
Increases damage and attack speed temporarily in combat
Increases potion effectiveness and brewing speed
Increases smithing mini-game performance and quality
Instantly restore a moderate amount of health.
Instantly restore durability to your equipped tools and weapons.
Intellectuals who master alchemy and magical arts. Scholars excel at discovery and experimentation.
Legends speak of smiths who forged the impossible. You are one of them.
Lightning that jumps between enemies, shocking each target
Lucky opportunists who find better loot and resources. Scavengers thrive on discovery.
Massively extend all mini-game timers, giving you all the time you need.
Massively increase critical chance and rarity for all actions.
Master crafters who excel at all creation disciplines. Artisans create better items faster.
Masters of combat and physical might. Warriors excel at dealing and taking damage in melee combat.
Mine Copper Ore
Mine Iron Ore
Move significantly faster for a brief period.
Piercing beam of darkness that weakens all it touches
Player chooses ANY skill from the available skill pool to start with
Restore health and mana simultaneously when you need it most.
Significantly increase critical hit chance for all actions.
Slowly restore health over time while active.
Spear that fires void beams through multiple targets
Swift explorers and natural harvesters. Rangers move quickly and gather resources efficiently.
Temporarily ignore all tier restrictions and requirements. Use any tool on any material, craft at any station.
Temporarily increases rare drop rates and material quality
The Battle Master challenges you to defeat 3 enemies to prove your combat prowess.
The Elder Sage wants you to gather 5 oak logs to prove your resourcefulness.
The Wandering Trader needs 3 copper ore and 3 iron ore for his studies.
The forest acknowledges your presence. Trees fall before you.
The forge accepts you. Your hammer rings with purpose.
Unleash catastrophic damage in a massive area, obliterating everything.
Whip that arcs lightning between foes
Wyrms fear your name. The great beasts fall before you.
Your first steps into the depths. Every mine begins with a single swing.
Your next attack hits with devastating force, dealing massive damage.
Your tools consume durability much more slowly.
effect: +20% defense
+20% physical damage
+25% movement and attack speed
+50% max HP and +40% physical damage
50% fire damage reduction
50% ice damage reduction
Adds fire damage to attacks
Adds lightning damage to attacks
Adds water damage to attacks
Apply to armor for +10% defense for 2 hours
Apply to tools for +15% gathering speed for 1 hour
Apply to weapons for +10% damage for 2 hours
Basic turret with no tag system support
Can dissolve most materials, use carefully
Disables all mechanical devices in 8 unit radius for 30 seconds
Elemental attacks deal bonus fire damage
Enables flight for up to 30 seconds, recharge time 2 minutes
Explodes for 40 damage in 3 unit radius
Explodes for 75 fire damage + lingering flames
Fires a burning laser beam
Fires arrows at enemies, 20 damage, 5 unit range
Fires concentrated light beam, 80 damage, 12 unit range
Fires flaming arrows, 35 damage + burn, 7 unit range
Fires lightning bolts, 70 damage + chain, 10 unit range
Fires net that slows enemies by 80% for 10 seconds
Grants resistance to all elements for 10 minutes
Heals 10 HP/sec in 5 unit radius for 2 minutes
Hybrid turret with chain AND cone
Items crafted with this add fire damage
Items crafted with this add frost damage
Items crafted with this add lightning damage
Launches grappling hook up to 15 units, pulls player to location
Massive explosion with huge radius
Restores 100 HP instantly
Restores 200 HP instantly
Restores 5 HP per second
Restores 50 HP instantly
Splits into 8 smaller explosions, total 120 damage over wide area
Sweeps cone of fire, 60 damage + lingering burn
Trap with all status effects
Triggers on contact, 25 damage + immobilize for 5 seconds
Triggers on contact, 30 damage + bleed
Triggers on proximity, 50 damage + slow
Used in engineering recipes for bombs and explosives
farewell: May your path be blessed with fortune!
Safe travels, and may you find rare treasures!
long: The Battle Master challenges you to defeat 3 enemies to prove your combat prowess. Venture into the wilderness and return victorious.
The Elder Sage wants you to gather 5 oak logs to prove your resourcefulness. Approach oak trees and use your axe to gather wood.
The Wandering Trader needs 3 copper ore and 3 iron ore for his studies. Mine rocks to find these ores.
message: As a Master Gatherer, you've unlocked Chain Harvest!
As a Master Smith, you've unlocked Master Craftsman!
As a Master Warrior, you've unlocked Whirlwind Strike!
The Battle Master teaches you Combat Strike!
The Battle Master teaches you Fortify!
The Elder Sage teaches you Sprint!
The Wandering Trader offers to teach you Treasure Sense.
The Wandering Trader teaches you Miner's Endurance!
Through countless battles, you've awakened Battle Fury!
Through countless experiments, you've developed Alchemist's Insight!
Through practice, you've developed Smith's Focus!
You've unlocked the skill: Miner's Fury!
Your experience gathering has sharpened your Keen Eye!

narrative: A dagger is deceptively simple - just a blade and a grip. But the balance must be perfect for quick, precise strikes.
A drake infused with elemental flame. It bathes foes in fire breath, knocks them back with wing beats, and calls down meteors when desperate.
A lance of pure darkness tears through reality. Those touched by the void find their strength sapped, their attacks feeble.
A living storm given form. Lightning arcs from its body, chaining between victims as it slams the ground with thunderous force.
A mysterious figure who wanders the lands collecting rare materials. His true purpose remains unknown.
A simple round shield - iron face with oak backing. Protects and strikes in equal measure.
A simple test weapon with valid tags.
A single bolt becomes many. Watch as lightning leaps from foe to foe, each target convulsing as the shock spreads through the battlefield.
A veteran warrior who trains adventurers in the art of combat. His scars tell stories of countless battles.
A warrior is defined by their deeds. Show me you can stand against the dangers of this world.
A warrior who maintains their tools never finds themselves defenseless.
A well-maintained tool is an investment. A broken tool is an expensive lesson.
Active quarry teeming with aggressive slimes and beetles. Better ore deposits and stone, but constant combat. Bring potions.
Advanced refinery with better efficiency and heat control.
Advanced refinery with better heat retention. Processes materials more efficiently with less waste.
An archon corrupted by the void. It bends space and shadow to pull victims close before tearing them apart with beams of pure darkness.

Ancient forest where the World Tree's influence lingers. Legendary wood materials grow here, impossibly rare. Only the most dedicated woodcutters will find this place, and even fewer survive long enough to harvest.
Ancient oak standing patient as centuries pass. The trees here grow thick and safe, perfect for beginners learning the woodcutter's craft.
Ancient tree with jet-black wood. Seems to absorb light and magic equally.
Ancient wolf wreathed in shadow. Pack leader that has survived countless battles.
Animated stone construct that guards ancient places. Slow but nearly indestructible.
Arcane enchanting table surrounded by floating crystals. Channels magical energies precisely.
Balanced steel longsword. The blade flows like water, strikes like thunder.
Bandages are for people with time. This is for people who don't.
Basic alchemy table with mortar, pestle, and glassware.
Basic axe for woodcutting. Simple but essential for any aspiring adventurer.
Basic leather protection. Better than nothing, lighter than metal.
Basic refinery for turning raw ores into usable ingots. Essential for any metalworker.
Basic stone forge suitable for working copper and iron. The foundation of smithing.
Basic stone furnace for refining raw ores into usable materials. Essential for any aspiring metalworker.
Basic workbench for assembling mechanical devices.
Basic workbench with simple tools for assembling mechanical devices.
Beam geometry with burn status effect.
Become the void. An aura of darkness surrounds you, leeching the life force from all who dare come close. Their pain is your healing.
Bend space itself to your will. A singularity forms at your target, pulling enemies inward before crushing them with arcane force.
Binding a fire crystal to ironwood creates a conduit for elemental power. The wood never burns, the crystal never dims - a perfect symbiosis.
Brilliant white stone that glows faintly with captured sunlight. Prized for temples and monuments.
Common brown beetle with hard carapace. Docile unless threatened, then surprisingly fierce.
Common copper deposit showing green-blue oxidation. Perfect for learning the basics of mining.
Common grey wolf that roams grasslands and forests. More curious than aggressive, but will defend territory if threatened.
Complex but valid combo: lightning chain with shock and slow.
Complex mechanisms demand careful attention. Rush the gears, get your fingers caught.
Contains unknown/typo tags to test error handling.
Corrosive slime that dissolves anything it touches. Highly aggressive and surprisingly fast.
Crackling with elemental fury, this whip doesn't just strike—it hunts. Each lash leaps from victim to victim, leaving a trail of shocked enemies in its wake.
Crafting a composite bow requires laminating different materials - wood for flexibility, sinew for power, silk for the string. Patience yields deadly accuracy.
Crafting a warhammer is about managing weight distribution. The crushing head must be perfectly balanced on the shaft, or it becomes a liability rather than a weapon.
Crystal suspended in perpetual crystallization. Neither solid nor energy, exists in quantum superposition.
Crystalline golem pulsing with magical energy. Rare guardian of legendary deposits.
Crystalline quarry where reality bends and legendary metals form. Orichalcum and adamantine deposits shimmer in the darkness. Elite enemies guard these treasures jealously.
Crystalline slime formed from pure elemental energy. Extremely rare and dangerously powerful.
Curved steel blade perfect for harvesting delicate plants. Clean cuts preserve quality and maximize yield.
Dark, impossibly hard ore found only in the deepest caverns. The world's exposed bones.
Deep cave system crawling with hostile creatures. Rich deposits of rare materials, but survival is not guaranteed. Form a party or come prepared.
Dense hardwood tree that survives temperature extremes. The wood holds its shape through any condition.
Dense volcanic rock with distinctive dark banding. Exceptional compression strength.

Dense woodland where ancient trees stand guard over abundant resources. The trees here grow thick and safe, perfect for beginners learning the woodcutter's craft. Occasional wolves patrol, but they're more curious than aggressive.
Dense, dark ore with carbon-rich composition. Superior to plain iron in every way.
Discovered through dedication. Only brewers of many potions gain this.
Discovered through dedication. Only smiths who craft many items gain this.
Each impact sends a shockwave of absolute zero. Enemies freeze mid-motion as they're blasted backward, turned into icy statues before they even hit the ground.
Elegant tree with papery white bark. Fine grain makes it ideal for detailed carving work.
Ethereal mithril axe that phases through wood fibers. Cuts with minimal resistance.
Every great lumberjack started by felling their hundredth tree.
Every journey begins with a single step. Show me you can gather what nature provides.
Exhale winter itself. A cone of absolute zero flash-freezes everything before you, leaving your enemies slowed or frozen solid.
Extremely large AOE to test geometry limits.
Fifty foes have fallen. You're no longer prey.
Flexible bamboo rod with silk line and bronze hook. Patience and the right tool can pull dinner from any water.
Forged from crystallized void essence, this spear doesn't throw—it tears. A beam of pure darkness lances through your enemies, weakening each it touches as it passes through flesh and armor alike.
Forging a steel battleaxe requires balance - too heavy and it's unwieldy, too light and it lacks impact. This versatile weapon can devastate with two hands or still threaten with one.
From ashes, rise. From wounds, strength. Death is merely an inconvenience.
Given freely to all who begin their journey into mining.
Gleaming golden-green ore from ancient civilizations. Entire empires were built on its discovery.
Granted by the Battle Master for proving your worth in combat.
Granted by the Elder Sage as reward for completing your first task.
Granted by the Wandering Trader for helping gather rare ores.
Grey metallic deposits throughout the rock face. The backbone of civilization's tools and weapons.
Has duplicate tags in the array.
Has effectTags field but it's empty.
Has only status tags, no damage type tags.
Has tags but missing required effectParams.
Heat, hammer, shape. The trinity of the smith begins with you.
Heavily armored beetle with metallic shell. Territorial and aggressive when its area is invaded.
I study the properties of metals. Help me gather samples and I'll reward you handsomely.
Impossibly perfect geometric form that cannot exist in three-dimensional space, yet here it is.
Improved forge with better heat retention. Can work steel reliably.
Improved forge with reinforced stone and efficient airflow. Reaches temperatures needed for steel.
Impurities burn away when you know exactly how hot, exactly how long.
Iron amulet holding a water crystal. Feels cool against your skin.
Iron plates protect vital organs. Heavy but reliable.
Knowledge is power, and you wield both. Potions brew faster in your hands, recipes reveal themselves, and magic bends to your will.
Larger, more aggressive wolf. Alpha predator that hunts in coordinated packs.
Layered sedimentary rock with fine grain. Compressed clay creates water-resistant sheets.
Legendary forge that bends reality itself. Can work metals that shouldn't exist.
Legendary mithril pickaxe that sings through stone. Impossibly light yet incredibly effective.
Legendary silver-white deposits that seem to drink in moonlight. Incredibly light yet impossibly strong.
Legendary tree connected to the World Tree's root network. The wood hums with accumulated magical essence.
Listen to the forest. Find the heartbeat. Match your swing to the ancient pulse.
Luck is what happens when preparation meets opportunity. This is what happens when luck meets steroids.
Magic flows where intention directs it. Unless you sneeze. Then it flows everywhere.
Massive beetle with diamond-hard shell. Ancient guardian that has survived eons.
Master forge with crystal enhancement. Can reach extreme temperatures.
Master forge with crystal-enhanced heating. Can reach temperatures that would melt lesser furnaces.
Master smiths don't rush. They breathe. They focus. They strike true.
Mastery isn't a destination. It's a standard you refuse to compromise.
Mithril dagger that seems to shimmer out of existence. Wickedly sharp, impossibly light.
One strike. One chance. One ending.
Only Master Gatherers can perform this advanced technique.
Only Master Smiths possess the skill to craft without failure.
Only Master Warriors can execute this devastating attack.
Only those who have defeated many foes unlock this combat prowess.
Pale sedimentary stone easy to work with basic tools. Foundation for simple construction.
Pale-barked tree with wood that absorbs shock beautifully. Weapon smiths prize these for handle material.
Perfect crystalline structure that refracts reality itself. Entire fortunes built on single specimens.
Pitch-black stone that pulls light into itself. Radiates subtle wrongness.
Plant your feet. Lower your center. Become the immovable object.
Precision engineering station with specialized tools for complex device assembly.
Precision is overrated when you can just hit them twelve times before they blink.
Professional alchemy setup with distillation equipment and precise measuring tools.
Rage is a weapon. Control it, channel it, unleash it.
Rare skill taught by the Wanderer to worthy explorers.
Rare tree whose wood rivals soft metals in hardness. Almost metallic ring when struck.
Razor-edged steel axe. Ancient trees fall before it.
Reality-bending ore that exists in multiple states simultaneously. Defies conventional physics.

Reality-warped depths where the impossible becomes mundane. Etherion deposits exist in superposition, primordial crystals defy physics. Only masters dare enter. Death is common, but the rewards transcend mortal crafting.
Reality-warped entity from beyond comprehension. Existence itself bends around it. Only the most prepared dare engage.
Reinforced leather boots with iron caps. Protects your feet without slowing you down.
Reinforced leather gloves with iron studs across the knuckles. Your hands are your tools - protect them properly.
Rocky quarry with exposed stone and mineral deposits. Small deposits of copper and iron glint in the sunlight. A few slimes ooze between rocks, but they're slow and easy to avoid.
Rules are for people who lack imagination. And sufficient mana reserves.
See the weaknesses others miss. Strike where it matters most.
Shallow cave entrance with basic resources and minimal danger. Beetles occasionally wander through, but they're docile unless provoked. Good for early exploration.
Silvery-white ore with a faint lunar glow. Ancient texts speak of its magical properties.
Simple alchemy table with mortar, pestle, and basic glassware. Sufficient for brewing basic potions.
Simple copper band with fire crystal. Radiates gentle warmth.
Simple enchanting table with basic rune-carving tools. Sufficient for minor enchantments.
Simple pine bow strung with treated sinew. Not powerful, but reliable.
Simple spear with copper tip. Keep your enemies at a distance.
Simple stone forge with basic bellows. Hot enough for copper and iron work, but struggles with harder metals.
Small green slime that oozes slowly across terrain. Mostly harmless unless you step on it.
Solid iron axe for serious forestry work. Bites deep and true.
Some call it luck. Some call it intuition. Mostly it's just knowing where to dig.
Sometimes subtlety fails. Sometimes you just need to hit something really, really hard.
Sometimes the best strategy is running away. Fast.
Speckled igneous rock with visible crystals. Harder and more reliable than limestone.
Spectral entity that phases between dimensions. Attacks pass through it unpredictably.
Spin. Strike. Repeat. Simple tactics are often the deadliest.
Steel and strength. You are the immovable wall, the unstoppable force. When enemies see you, they know: their time has come.
Steel bracelet with lightning shard. Crackles with stored static.
Steel helm with full face protection. Your head stays attached, which is nice.
Steel pickaxe with perfect balance. Makes hard rock feel like clay.
Steel plate leggings with articulated joints. Protecting your legs without sacrificing mobility is the mark of quality armor.
Stone that remembers everything it witnesses. Contains geological memory of eons.
Subtlety is for people who can't level mountains.
TEST: Alchemy with BOTH potion and transmutation tags (potion should win)
TEST: Alchemy with EMPTY tags array
TEST: Alchemy with NO potion/transmutation tag (should default to transmutation)
TEST: Alchemy with explicit 'potion' tag
TEST: Alchemy with explicit 'transmutation' tag
TEST: Alchemy with multiple effect tags
TEST: Refining with EMPTY tags array
TEST: Refining with MULTIPLE bonus process tags (crushing + grinding + purifying + alloying)
TEST: Refining with NO bonus tags (pure smelting)
TEST: Refining with ONLY high-probability tags (grinding 40% + purifying 30%)
TEST: Refining with alloying tag for maximum rarity upgrade (+2 tiers)
TEST: Weapon with ALL functional combat tags inherited
TEST: Weapon with CONFLICTING hand requirement tags (1H + 2H)
TEST: Weapon with EMPTY tags array
TEST: Weapon with NO functional tags (only metadata tags)
Tall conifer reaching toward the sky. Flexible wood perfect for bows and lightweight construction.
Tests conflicting status effects (freeze + burn + slow + root).
Tests if tag matching is case-sensitive.
Tests multiple geometry tags (cone + chain + circle).
Tests what happens when chain and cone geometry are both specified.
Tests what happens with conflicting elemental tags (fire + ice).
The Elder Sage has guided countless travelers on their first steps. His wisdom is freely given to all who seek it.
The Wandering Trader's research requires various metals. This quest can be repeated daily.
The blade itself never cools. Each swing projects a wave of searing flame that engulfs all before you. The heat is so intense that victims continue burning long after the strike.
The brew reveals its secrets to those patient enough to watch. And lucky enough to not explode.
The dragon's roar becomes silence. You are the end of their age.
The earth provides for those who know its secrets. And sometimes, it just really likes you.
The first quest given to all travelers. A simple test of gathering skills.
The first true test of a warrior. Defeat enemies and prove your combat abilities.
The forge burns hotter with ores touched by flame. You seek them instinctively.
The foundational smithing technique - blade, tang, handle. Simple in concept, demanding in execution. Every smith remembers their first sword.
The generous earth rewards those who know where to look. And how to ask nicely.
The mountain yields to those who show it proper respect. Or, failing that, overwhelming force.
The stone remembers your first strike. Keep swinging.
The wilderness is your home. Trees fall faster before you, and you move like the wind. Nature bends to those who respect it.
This weapon hungers. Each strike opens wounds that refuse to close, and as your enemies bleed, the blade drinks—and so do you. Feel their vitality flow into you with each passing second.
Time is relative. Especially when you're cheating.
Translucent crystal formation that hums near magical power sources. Amplifies energies passing through it.
Turret with NO tags to test fallback behavior.
Upgraded pickaxe that can tackle tougher deposits. Iron reliability meets practical design.
Veteran gatherers develop an eye for spotting rare materials.
Volcanic glass born in eruption's heart. Razor-sharp edges, incredibly brittle.
When you strike the anvil, gods pause to listen. Your work transcends mortality.
Where others see rocks, you see treasures. Fortune favors the prepared, and you are always prepared.
Why harvest one at a time when you can harvest all of them?
Wild forest where predators hunt and danger lurks behind every tree. Higher tier wood is common, but aggressive wolf packs make harvesting risky. High risk, high reward.
Wounds close. Bones knit. Given enough time, everything heals.
You are not confined by tradition or specialty. Every path is open, every skill within reach. You are limitless.
You don't believe in luck. You ARE luck.
You don't fight. You dance. And everything around you dies beautifully.
You see what others miss: the potential locked within raw matter.
You tear a fragment from the heavens itself. The meteor crashes down with the fury of a dying star, leaving nothing but scorched earth and burning foes.
You're not done yet. Get up.
Your first pickaxe. The gateway to greater resources and deeper discoveries.
Your hands shape reality. What takes others hours, you complete in moments. What they craft once, you perfect instantly.
playstyle: Direct combat, high survivability, straightforward gameplay
questComplete: Excellent! Those will serve my research perfectly.
Impressive! You've earned my respect and rewards.
Well done! Return to me when ready to claim your rewards.
questInProgress: Go forth and prove yourself in battle!
Have you found those materials yet? I await eagerly!
How goes your task? The forest awaits your efforts.
requirement: Reach level 10 and craft 100 smithed items
Reach level 10 and find 50 rare+ materials
Reach level 10 and land 500 critical hits
Reach level 10 and mine 1000 ore nodes
Reach level 10 and survive at <10% HP 50 times
short: Collect 3 copper ore and 3 iron ore
Gather 5 oak logs for the Elder Sage
title: Ancient Mentor
Collector of Rarities
First Steps
Material Research
Prove Your Worth
Weapons Instructor
apprentice_warrior
novice_forester
